original_text: Then you will destroy your idols and your images of false gods. You used silver or gold to make them beautiful. But now you will throw them away like a piece of dirty cloth. You will tell them, ‘Go away!’ Then you will destroy your idols and your images of false gods. You used silver or gold to make them beautiful. But now you will throw them away like a piece of dirty cloth. You will tell them, ‘Go away!’
korean_text: 또 너희가 너희 조각한 우상에 입힌 은과 부어 만든 우상에 올린 금을 더럽게 하여 불결한 물건을 던짐 같이 던지며 이르기를 나가라 하리라

sentences.original_text: Then you will destroy your idols
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너는 너의 우상들을 파괴할 것이다

sentences.original_text: and your images of false gods
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 거짓 신들의 형상들을 파괴할 것이다

sentences.original_text: But now you will throw them away
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이제 너는 그것들을 던져 버릴 것이다

sentences.original_text: like a piece of dirty cloth
Then you will destroy your idols
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너는 너의 우상들을 파괴할 것이다

sentences.original_text: and your images of false gods
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 거짓 신들의 형상들을 파괴할 것이다

sentences.original_text: But now you will throw them away
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이제 너는 그것들을 던져 버릴 것이다

sentences.original_text: like a piece of dirty cloth
